vv63:7.3: Migaṃ tañceva → migaṃ gantveva (s2, s3) | migavadhañca (mr)
vv63:10.4: Mantvā → mantā (s2, s3, pts1-2, mr), bhāsasi → bhāsase (bj)
vv63:17.4: tepi no → na tepi (bj) | tepi na (s2, s3, pts1-2)
vv63:18.1: andhakaveṇḍuputtā → andhakaveṇhuputtā (bj, pts1-2) | andhakaveṇḍaputtā (s2, s3, mr)
vv63:31.3: Tathāpakāro → tathappakāro (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2), tavāyaṃ → tavayaṃ (bj, pts1-2)
vv63:38.1: Nandane ca vane → nandanopavane (bj, pts2) | nandane pavare (s2, s3) | nandane pavane (pts1, mr)
